https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jZhjbRzWgjF1d82dy0GtwOySuYk.jpg Paris is being rocked by a wave of bomb blasts. Stuck in a video game, Sadim calls the players helpline from a phone booth. Laurence takes his call and talks him through it. But their virtual chit-chat turns to drama as one misunderstanding leads to another. Bad Connection
